outputs.output_descr: The project aims to establish participatory decision-making fora in order to institutionalize representation of communities in decisions on extractive industries and to safeguard their rights and mitigate against growing tensions between communities and investors. Additionally, public institutions, the private sector and civil society will have systems to ensure transparent, accountable and inclusive management of revenues from extractive industries which will contribute to peace and sustainable development.

project_descr: Establishment of decision-making fora to institutionalize participation and inclusion of communities in decisions on extractive industries and promote collaborative engagement between communities, government and private sector.
project_title: Extractive Industries for Sustainable Devpt in Kenya
